title: "Group 25 UCSB domestic grad enrollment"
author: "Danielle Sclafani & Iris Foxfoot"
date: "11/24/2020"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
ucsb_grad <- read_csv(here("data", "ucsb_grad_data.csv"))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = ucsb_grad, aes(x = year_abbr, y = domestic_enrollment, fill = ethnicity)) + geom_col(position = "fill")+
  labs(x = "Domestic Enrollment Percentage")
```
